sentences.sContent: Mary twisted her hair into a braid.
sentences.sContent_eng: Mary twisted her hair into a braid.
sentences.sCn: 玛丽把头发编成了一条辫子。

sentences.sContent: A woman may not notice hair loss itself but may notice that her ponytail or braid is getting thinner.
sentences.sContent_eng: A woman may not notice hair loss itself but may notice that her ponytail or braid is getting thinner.
sentences.sCn: 一个女人可能不会注意到脱发本身，而是可能会注意到她的马尾或编织越来越薄。

sentences.sContent: Just part your hair to the side, weave your hair into a braid, and use bobby pins to create a twisted style to your liking.
sentences.sContent_eng: Just part your hair to the side, weave your hair into a braid, and use bobby pins to create a twisted style to your liking.
sentences.sCn: 这个发型很容易：把头发分到一边，编成辫子，用发夹将头发的发尾弄成你喜欢的偏歪的样子，营造时尚感。

words.tran: 编辫子的；有饰带镶缀的

trans.tranOther: to weave or twist together three pieces of hair or cloth to form one length
a narrow band of material formed by twisting threads together, used to decorate the edges of clothes
